很棒的一款游戏。
从刚开始的惊心动魄到现在的实力自信，在这款游戏里玩的也不算短了，人屠双皇都上过，这游戏给予了我很长时间的快乐，玩人类时和屠夫斗智斗勇，玩屠夫时和人类互相欺骗，走位，节奏。
这游戏的要领很多，想玩好也不简单，但他带给你的快乐是货真价实的，玩人类和三个队友互帮互助，或者和三个好朋友开黑互相坑杀对方，每一个屠夫都有不同的游戏体验，十几个屠夫让人不容易玩腻。
不说了，，黎明杀机我吹爆

В целом хорошая концепция игры, захватывает. Но есть один жирный существенный минус. Это токсичное сообщество. Каждый мелкий пiздюк, которому родители купили кампухтер думает, что он самый классный поцан на районе и ему все можно. Делая -4 в катке за мана в послеигровом чате ты непременно получишь тонну высратого г0вна. Ты  при любом раскладе лох, нуб и что-то там еще (даже если ты мейнман и у тебя за плечами овердохера часов). Сурвы хотят, чтобы ты играл по их правилам, давал им сбегать и фармил очки. Стой от крюка как можно дальше - уйди в самый дальний угол, а иначе - ты (фу) КЕМПЕР! И им наплевать на то, что задумка игры за убийцу - убить выживших, а за сурва - сбежать от маньяка. Бесконечные баги, просадки фпс, и хиты через 4 метра - это норма. Хочешь повысить ранг? Едва ли. Хочешь хорошей игры в рандоме? Не-а. Если тебе дороги нервы - не покупай эту игру. А если ты мелкий пiздюк, то обязательно найдешь себе в игре тиму с дискордом. И да прибудет с тобой фиолетовый фонарь!
love it
One of the best games ive ever played, should be alot more popular than it is now.
me encanta este juego

Игра, которая подогреет вашу пятую точку в самый лютый мороз. Каждый новенький игрок начинает свою первую катку в предвкушении прилива адреналина, разработок тактик и лютых мансов, а заканчивает её в образе Билла Овербека: докуривая третью пачку сигарет и потирая ноющий шрам. Если вы думаете, что здесь страдают выжившие, то поикайте пару раз, тут страдают маньяки. Причём они подвергаются разным видам насилия: начиная с физического попадания в собственный капкан, заканчивая душевными травмами. 
А вообще мне зашло, рекомендую с:

UPD: ФПС пофиксили, теперь выдаёт стабильные 70-80, что радует. Апргрейднули карты - тоже приятно. Но вот баги и читы исправить не могут =(
Nominated Labor Of Love! Devs always try, and never give up!

I have an immense love/hate relationship with this game. While on one hand this game is insanely fun (usually) and addicting, it can also be an absolute nightmare. 

Now, let's start off with the positives:
(PS I may only have 32 hours on Steam at the time I'm writing this, but I have at least 1,000 on PS4 so I'm not a baby who barely understands what I'm saying.)

First things first, I'm a huge fan of the overall world of Dead by Daylight, with the lore of characters such as The Oni and The Blight being incredibly immersive and interesting (Blight especially since I find Britain during the First Opium War to be incredibly interesting). 
Second, I'm a big fan of the creativity of the team, although their creativity often bites them in the ass in the long run, case in point, The Twins. While The Twins are some of the most creative killers to date, their power isn't exactly the best, and as of the time I'm writing (2 Days after they launched), they don't even work.
Finally, I can respect how our lads at BHVR are pretty dedicated to their game, even though they aren't exactly the best at managing it, we'll get into that later.

That isn't anywhere near every little bit of praise I have for this game, but I don't exactly think I can write them all down.

Now, we move onto the issues I have with this game, which, unfortunately, I have more to talk about than with the things I enjoy.

I'll start with easily the biggest issue I have with the game, and what is pretty much the main reason why I don't recommend it; it is way too hard for a new player to get into. Every 3 months, the game receives a new expansion that includes a killer with a completely new and original power, 6 new perks, and, up until recently, a new map. This is absolutely hell for a new player to learn and understand, with 164 perks, 22 killers and 35 maps, new players are incredibly overwhelmed, and this issue grows worse every 3 months. I was lucky enough to have first gotten the game when The Clown was still a relatively new killer, so I didn't struggle all too much, but I feel sorry for anyone who's just bought the game. I feel like perks such as Decisive Strike and Hex: No One Escapes Death are made more problematic by the fact that new players don't know about them, so when they get DStriked or insta-downed, they'd feel (understandably), cheated out of a win, as it wasn't their fault they didn't know what those perks did.

My next issue is concerning the developers of the game, BHVR, and their poor treatment and understanding of the game. While I really do try my hardest to support and defend these chaps, I still feel like I have to admit that they really do need to improve their behaviour (pun very much intended). For starters, I would like to point out their blatant lack of understanding of how the game works, such as one of the developers saying that Clown is a strong killer, but in his current state as of 2/12/20, he is absolute rubbish and is in dire need of a rework (I know that he's getting one). They're also starting to gain a reputation for making unnecessary changes, while the things that actually do need changes are just ignored, for example, nerfing The Pig and leaving The Spirit the way she is. I hope that this trend does not continue in the future, for I love this game to bits, and I really don't want it to die.

So in conclusion, while I love this game to pieces, I really, really do not recommend that you pick it up unless you're confident that you will like the game and have an understanding of how it works.

Se avete giocato a Dead by Daylight da quando è stato rilasciato, saprete quanto è passato ormai. 
Gli sviluppatori non sono sempre stati i migliori a dire la verità alla loro fanbase, i glitch hanno dilagato per troppo tempo, e c'è stato un sacco di problemi oltre a quelli di cui sopra. 
Nonostante tutto questo, Dead by Daylight è stato uno dei migliori giochi che abbia mai giocato. 
L'ingannevolmente semplice struttura di gioco è assolutamente imprevedibile a causa della quantità di assassini e sopravvissuti, vantaggi e offerte, e i giocatori e stili di gioco assortiti. Onestamente, posso dire che ogni gioco in cui sono stato è stato un po' diverso dall'ultimo. Dead by Daylight è in una categoria a sé stante.

Lo classificherei come un gioco di sopravvivenza di orrore, ma sembra sfidare la generalizzazione ad ogni giro.
È un gioco spaventoso, ma mi sono divertito come uno dei miei amici.

Gli stili di gioco sono infiniti. 
Basandoti sulla situazione, cerchi di aggirare la mappa furtivamente, e ti tieni il respiro in gola mentre l'assassino non passa a pochi centimetri dal tuo personaggio, o puoi puntare le armi verso l'assassino, schiacciandolo ad ogni angolo. 


Adoro questo gioco!

BeHavior: но ЗАЧЕМ?! Зачем исправлять баги и ошибки? Зачем делать нормальный баланс? Пусть сурвы новички играют против топ киллера и погибают в течение 5 минут после начала игры. Пусть киллер новичок играет против топ сурвов не имея возможности даже ранить одного из них. Зачем делать быстрый поиск игры за киллера?
Пусть люди в очереди посидят, мб успеют пообедать, а то и поспать.
Давайте мы лучше добавим платных скинов. Хорошая идея! А еще мы выпустим DLC с новыми киллерами(КОТОРЫХ МЫ ЕСТЕСТВЕННО ПОНЁРФИМ ЧЕРЕЗ МЕСЯЦ ДО НЕИГРАБЕЛЬНОГО БЛ@ТЬ СОСТОЯНИЯ) и сурвами и продадим их в 2 раза выше нормальной цены. Очень круто! Также с каждым обновлением мы специально будем выпускать новые баги, чтобы в следующем обновлении рассказать о том, что пофиксили старые и какие мы молодцы что это сделали.

Как итог получается: платная игра, платные длс, платные скины, бесплатные баги и вылеты. Очень печально, что игру, единственную в своем жанре, губит такое отношение разработчиков. В связи с последними событиями, это может привести к тому же, к чему привело другой ваш проект.

Покупать за полную цену не рекомендую (с 50% скидкой - да, стоит тех денег, даже с учетом всех багов). ДЛС на свое усмотрение, шмотки в принципе бесполезные.

Given this game far too much of my time, and in no way does it deserve it. Devs are memeworthy at this point with how many mistakes they make. They are more interested in making a quick $ then focusing on the countless flaws and bugs with their game, and it's honestly embarrassing at this point, and cannot be defended any longer. If you are planning on buying this game, consider if you are okay with a game which has more interest in putting out a new cosmetic every week than fixing the bugs which every update seems to introduce more of. Other reviews will tell you how bad the bugs are, every "patch" introduces more bugs than it fixes, and these bugs break things which should not have problems and have no correlation to anything that's been added. Without fail, at least one perk, if not more, breaks and no longer works properly/at all every update. Licensed DLC killer Freddy has been ruined for a ridiculously long time, with the devs continuously telling us they're working on a revamp of the killer, which has been going on for what feels like at least a year now. Concept of the game is good, but the poor effort from the devs who have their priorities in the wrong places ruin this game, and people considering buying this game deserve to know what they're getting themselves into. To top it all off, it has what could possibly be one of the most toxic gaming communities of all time.

If you like buying cosmetics for a game that doesn't work properly, and then experiencing toxic gameplay/post game chats every other game, this is one for you.

This game can put you through heaven and hell within a timespan of just 10 minutes. Sometimes it is like the bruise on your arm that hurts when you touch it but still you cannot stop touching it over and over again....I think the term "sweet sweet pain" describes it the best. I am usually playing survivor main and I am, by all means, just a very mediocore player. 

In my opinion there are a number of things you need to make yourself aware of before really playing DBD:

1. The game is designed to frustrate you. There will be plenty of situations where your oponent will tunnel you, hook camp you, outsmart you at the mindgames or have a setup which counters yours in every way. It will leave you with an utter sense of frustration, unfairness and game mechanics beeing broken. But just 1 match where you are able to outsmart your oponent or the match is just very exciting because of everybody kind of being at the same level, will get you instantly hooked again.
2. This game is antisocial social..... as survivors you are not able to communicate with each other except by handsigns during the match (if you are not playing with a group of friends). This makes it almost feel as a singleplayer game sometimes adding to the feeling of dread an "being by yourself against a Killer that is faster and stronger than you". Also when playing a Killer you are supposed to be antisocial and free of remorse. Yes, this sometimes mean you will encounter Killers that tunnel and/or camp you. Deal with it and hope your fellow survivors counter this strategy by concentrating on doing gens. 
3. You will encounter a lot, lot, lot very antisocial people. People will disconnect a lot when, for example, they get hit by the Killer or as the Killer they feel like they don't stand a chance against the survivors. I think there should be more punishments for players doing this but on the other hand this sometimes also leads to situations where the "remaining" players really can shine.
4. The game has a very steep learning curve which can add to the frustration.

So, I keep coming back to play this game because it is so rewarding in a frustrating way. Very different from all other games that I have played so far. I will continue to "play to lose"

I have a genuine love with this game. Yes, there are problems with game play and the community but every game has that. I would say that if you are even slightly interested in the game give it a shot, don't let rumors you hear of a toxic community steer you away. Occasionally you'll run into someone that makes your skin crawl, but don't let them bog down your enjoyment, play the game how you want, and don't let anyone tell you differently.

I really like the idea,setting and the style this game is using but it is not well done.

In fact you can see how the develepers rather push out content then fixing major bugs and ignore really good sugestions done by the community.

I like how this game can be scary and fun but is sometimes just as frustrating because of hitbox issues and ther bugs which make the game unplayable sometimes and often unenjoyable.

Update: July 21 2022: For the first time in the past 3 years it is fun to play both sides. The last update brought a lot of needed changes to the game. The only ones crying are because they can't play with out getting 100 2nd chances. 

Update: MMR 100% fucked the game. Good news is i have finally have a reason to uninstall and move on from this shit show.  

I normally don't write reviews but i had to for this one. The core idea of the game is amazing enough that i can look past all the bugs the game has after each patch.

At the end of the day i still can't recommend the game mainly due to the ranking system. It is something i have had a problem with for a long time, and to tell you the truth i am just sick of it. There is no reason when you are rank 20 -15  you should be playing with people with over 3000+ hours. Most ranking systems are put in place so you can play with people of your own skill level. I think this is a big part of why so many pick up the game and never really stick with it. 

To say its frustrating to have a full lobby of survivors or a killer who have been rank 1 and have 1000s of hours at rank 20 is an understatement. It really hard to learn the game when i get lobbies like this all the time. I really think something needs to be done about this, but seeing as the rank system has not changed in 4 year almost i don't see any changes ever come.

PRIMEIRA GUERRA MUNDIAL 

A Primeira Guerra Mundial (também conhecida como Grande Guerra ou Guerra das Guerras até o início da Segunda Guerra Mundial) foi uma guerra global centrada na Europa, que começou em 28 de julho de 1914 e durou até 11 de novembro de 1918. O conflito envolveu as grandes potências de todo o mundo,[2] que se organizaram em duas alianças opostas: os aliados (com base na Tríplice Entente entre Reino Unido, França e Rússia) e os Impérios Centrais, a Alemanha e a Áustria-Hungria. Originalmente a Tríplice Aliança era formada pela Alemanha, Áustria-Hungria e a Itália; mas como a Áustria-Hungria tinha tomado a ofensiva, violando o acordo, a Itália não entrou na guerra pela Tríplice Aliança.[3] Estas alianças reorganizaram-se (a Itália lutou pelos Aliados) e expandiram-se com mais nações que entraram na guerra. Em última análise, mais de setenta milhões de militares, incluindo sessenta milhões de europeus, foram mobilizados em uma das maiores guerras da história.[4][5] Mais de nove milhões de combatentes foram mortos, em grande parte por causa de avanços tecnológicos que determinaram um crescimento enorme na letalidade de armas, mas sem melhorias correspondentes em proteção ou mobilidade. Foi o sexto conflito mais mortal na história da humanidade e que posteriormente abriu caminho para várias mudanças políticas, como revoluções em muitas das nações envolvidas.[6]

Entre as causas da guerra incluem-se as políticas imperialistas estrangeiras das grandes potências da Europa, como o Império Alemão, o Império Austro-Húngaro, o Império Otomano, o Império Russo, o Império Britânico, a Terceira República Francesa e a Itália. Em 28 de junho de 1914, o assassinato do arquiduque Francisco Fernando da Áustria, o herdeiro do trono da Áustria-Hungria, pelo nacionalista iugoslavo Gavrilo Princip, em Sarajevo, na Bósnia, foi o gatilho imediato da guerra, o que resultou em um ultimato da Áustria-Hungria contra o Reino da Sérvia.[7][8] Diversas alianças formadas ao longo das décadas anteriores foram invocadas, com o que, dentro de algumas semanas, as grandes potências estavam em guerra; através de suas colônias, o conflito logo se espalhou ao redor do planeta.

Em 28 de julho, o conflito iniciou-se com a invasão austro-húngara da Sérvia,[9][10] seguida pela invasão alemã da Bélgica, Luxemburgo e França, e um ataque russo contra a Alemanha. Depois da marcha alemã até Paris ter levado a um impasse, a Frente Ocidental se transformou em uma batalha de atrito estático com uma linha de trincheiras que pouco mudou até 1917. Na Frente Oriental, o exército russo lutou com sucesso contra as forças austro-húngaras, mas foi forçado a recuar da Prússia Oriental e da Polônia pelo exército alemão. Frentes de batalha adicionais abriram-se depois que o Império Otomano entrou na guerra em 1914, Itália e Bulgária em 1915 e a Romênia em 1916. Depois de uma ofensiva alemã em 1918 ao longo da Frente Ocidental, os Aliados forçaram o recuo dos exércitos alemães em uma série de ofensivas de sucesso e as forças dos Estados Unidos começaram a entrar nas trincheiras. A Alemanha, que teve o seu próprio problema com os revolucionários, neste ponto, concordou com um cessar-fogo em 11 de novembro de 1918, episódio mais tarde conhecido como Dia do Armistício. A guerra terminou com a vitória dos Aliados.

Os eventos nos conflitos locais eram tão tumultuosos quanto nas grandes frentes de batalha, tentando os participantes mobilizar a sua mão de obra e recursos econômicos para lutar uma guerra total. Até o final da guerra, quatro grandes potências imperiais — os impérios Alemão, Russo, Austro-Húngaro e Otomano — deixaram de existir. Os Estados sucessores dos dois primeiros perderam uma grande quantidade de seu território, enquanto os dois últimos foram completamente desmontados. O mapa da Europa central foi redesenhado em vários novos países menores.[11] A Liga das Nações, organização precursora das Nações Unidas, foi formada na esperança de evitar outro conflito dessa magnitude. Esses esforços falharam, exacerbando o nacionalismo nos vários países, a depressão econômica, as repercussões da derrota da Alemanha e os problemas com o Tratado de Versalhes, que foram fatores que contribuíram para o início da Segunda Guerra Mundial.[12]

8 de septiembre del 2020

-Sigo jugando este juego a pesar de que lo deje un tiempo, solo quería advertir que el juego tiene un problema con ciertos monitores u pantallas de la laptop, asegurate de tener el juego con una escala y distribuicion en 100%, ya que si no, el juego no te toma ciertos "Clicks", refiriéndome al m1 y m2 (click derecho y izquierdo), por lo demás todo bien y como todos los juegos hay gente toxica. También aclarar de que si empiezas en el juego, y quieres jugar de killer, porfavor no campees, ya que la forma de ganar es perseguirlos, colgarlos y destruir motores. Todo depende si estas con survivors toxicos, si es ese el caso, hazles facecamp si quieres. (Recomendado comprar en oferta)

En cuanto a graficos el juego es bastante antiguo, piensa que salió el 2016 y siguen metiendo contenido. El juego en ultra es un poco parecido al alto y al medio, dependiendo de las opciones cambia la iluminación y partículas. La única paja del juego es que ciertos personajes son DLC, es cierto que trae bastantes personajes a elegir, pero al cabo del tiempo te aburres. El juego tiene unos llamados "Fragmentos iridiscentes" con los cuales obtienes subiendo de nivel y puedes con ello canjear personajes de "DLC". Basicamente jugar de survivor es levelearlos y pasearte al killer.

Solid Game
Nice!

200+ hours in this game and it's still fresh every time. Yes, the learning curve is basically a cliff for your first dozen matches and your fellow survivors can be worse than AI bots, but once you get the core mechanics down and start to learn the tricks of evading the killer or juking a survivor the game shows its true genius.

The devs are continually updating the game, new killers, maps, and survivors keep it fresh. I wish Killers would get notified or some sort of bonus for facing SWF teams but thats really my only complaint about the game. It's an otherwise perfect game in this genre.
